# Summary
Rankly is an Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) platform that helps businesses track and improve their visibility in AI-powered search engines like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Claude, Gemini, and more. We provide analytics and insights to help brands understand how they're cited and represented in AI-generated answers.

# Key Sections

## Homepage (/)
The main landing page introduces Rankly's core value proposition: tracking brand performance inside AI answers. Features include Answer Engine Analytics, Traffic Analytics, and Actionables.

## Features
- /features/answer-engine-analytics - Track how your brand performs inside AI answers across multiple platforms
- /features/traffic-analytics - See how AI mentions turn into conversions and track traffic sources
- /features/actionables - Get specific recommendations and strategies to improve your AEO performance

## About (/about)
Learn about Rankly's mission to make Answer Engine Optimization measurable and actionable. Discover how we're transforming AI visibility tracking.
